message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $120. It's worth a lot to me, but I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. I hope this is acceptable to you.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $95 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's close this deal!
